ROOT.ds100: select id,h.deptid,h.deptname,h.deviceid,h.devicename,devicetype,event,content,affect,h.reporter,h.checker,eventtime, to_char(eventtime,'yyyy-mm-dd'), to_char(eventtime,'yyyy-mm-dd')||' '||h.devicename||' '||case event when null then ' ' else event end as event from ys_db.ysh_ts_event_happen h join ys_db.ysh_ts_event_solve s on h.id = s.happenid where s.endtime is not null
